Srishti Manipal Institute of Art, Design and Technology offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, PG-Diploma and Doctoral programs in the areas of art, design, and technology. College_Summary: South Asia Institute of Advanced Christian Studies - [SAIACS] has been dedicated to theological studies and research work. The institution offers post graduate courses and research work on both biblical and contextually related theological work that will cause a significant difference in the lives of those who believe in the almighty and also help them understand their faith for God. The institution’s vision is to raise up to global standards of providing education that will greatly serve the mission of Church of Jesus Christ. The institution aims at encouraging students to take up studies related to the holy bible and helping students in having reflective thinking and also having the mentality to treat everyone equally.

College_Name: Southern Asia Bible College - [SABC], Bangalore
College_Summary: Southern Asia Bible college is a private theological institution of the Assemblies of God. The institution is located in a town called Kothanur in Bengaluru City. The institution was founded in 1951 by Alfred Cawston with an aim to train people for the Christian ministry in all of Southern Asia. The institution is also the founder of the Asia Theological Association(ATA). The institution is also part of The Evangelical Fellowship of India and the Association for Evangelical Theological Education in India which works as a voice for the poor and oppressed. Currently, the institution is one of the most reputed bible colleges in the country.

College_Name: Acharya Deshabhushan Ayurvedic Medical College and Hospital
College_Summary:
Acharya Deshabhushan Ayurvedic Medical College and Hospital, Belgaum, Karnataka is affiliated to RGUHS and was an initiative of the Latthe Education Society. The staff is appointed with respect to the rules and regulations laid down under CCIM and Ayush Govt. of India with special post-graduation degree in respective fields. Latthe Education Society was established on 13th June 1951. In order to duly honor late Annasaheb Latthe, the establishment of this vast society was dependent on the fund collected from “Dakshin Bharat Jain Sabha”. This great persona had to bear multiple responsibilities as Diwan of Kolhapur State, First Finance Minister of Bombay provision, councilor, Professor, Editor & Educationalist. 
The headquarters is situated at Sangli. The Society has grown tremendously & now it is running as many as 38 educational institutions, including KG schools, primary schools, High school, Colleges & Professional institutions.

The College accomplishes its mission to scale new heights in performance by providing comprehensive, career-focused educational programs and services. The reputation of this college is so much so that the World Health Organization chose this institute to establish a Service clinic in the college. It is also a recognized center for the Ph.D. programme in the six specialties with 3 recognized Ph.D. guides. It is also a centre for numerous ongoing projects with the World Health Organization and the Government of India.

Admission to MBBS is done on the basis of NEET UG whereas for Diploma and PG Diploma on the basis of Merit. KIMS Hubli offers MBBS at the UG level, MD/ MS and PG Diploma at the PG level and DM/ M.Ch at the Super Specialty level.
